body_html:
I support whatever makes the testing work. We're not officially supporting
GPU on Mac, so not sure this needs to work.
On Wed, Feb 3, 2016 at 18:39 Vijay Vasudevan notifications@github.com
wrote:

For expediency, should we just disable this test on Mac for now?

  1. Most macs don't have GPUs that TensorFlow supports right now
  2. It's not clear that gpu_retry_allocator has that much of a long life :)

Thoughts @martinwicke https://github.com/martinwicke and @zheng-xq
https://github.com/zheng-xq ?

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#965 (comment)
.

GPU on Mac, so not sure this needs to work.
